dcterms:creator: Daniel Borkan

dcterms:description: The dataset consists of instances of 226235 online comments that are manually labeled into various levels of TOXICITY, including a binary classification of TOXIC or NON-TOXIC.
dcterms:title: Jigsaw Unintended Bias in Toxicity Classification

dcterms:creator: Andrew L. Maas
Raymond E. Daly
Peter T. Pham
Dan Huang
Andrew Y. Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: The dataset contains 50,000 movie reviews labeled with binary sentiment of positive and negative, with an even distribution of both classes.
dcterms:title: IMDB Dataset of 50K Movie Reviews

dcterms:creator: Tiago A Almeida
José María G Hidalgo
Akebo Yamakami
dcterms:description: A collection of 5,574 SMS messages tagged as either ham (legitimate) or spam, useful for studying SMS spam filtering.
dcterms:title: SMS Spam Collection Dataset
